text:
Our powers combined

Power is set to play a feature role in the global energy transition as renewables make the grid cleaner and new industries electrify.

We’re on top of the trend. In the last two years, Wood Mackenzie has acquired two of the world’s top renewable energy research firms, Greentech Media (including its market intelligence arm GTM Research) and MAKE.

Since the acquisitions, we’ve invested heavily in integrating our datasets, our technology platforms, and most importantly, our teams.

We’re excited to formally introduce Wood Mackenzie Power & Renewables. Working as a unified team, we’re at the forefront of the global energy transition.
title: Power & Renewable Energy Analysis

meta_data.description: Understand the next regulatory trend, predict fuel and emissions prices and benefit from the latest insight and analysis into power and renewable energy.
